title: Divya Chandramukhi Haaram Set with Matching Jhumkas
materials: meticulously set with sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a central Emerald and a subtle Ruby accent in the Jhumkas. Adorned with South Sea Pearls.
features: A stunning Chandramukhi Haaram featuring intricate floral and leaf patterns. The necklace is designed with alternating floral motifs leading to a grand pendant, enhanced with dangling pearls. The matching Jhumkas (Chand Bali style) complement the Haaram, mirroring the floral patterns and pearl drops. Showcases a brilliant Hyderabadi polish, enhancing the luster and brilliance of the piece.
colors: with subtle pops of green (Emerald) and red (Ruby). The pearls add a soft
occasions: Perfect for a traditional Telugu wedding (Pelli)
or other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for grand receptions and cultural events.
description: This Haaram and Jhumka set embodies the grandeur of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The intricate design and shimmering CZ stones create a captivating look, while the inclusion of genuine South Sea pearls adds a touch of elegance and sophistication. A truly heirloom-worthy piece, perfect for the modern bride who appreciates traditional beauty.
